decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 12.07/04A received 12/07/2013  & 12.07/02C, 12.07/03C received 30/09/2013 therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The extension  hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 35 Viola Avenue, Feltham.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  western elevation walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey ground floor side and rear extension
